title: How a Scrappy African Team is Making the Move From Gravel to Grand Tours
content:
In 2025, Team Amani is fielding a UCI Continental squad with goals of dominating African road races. It's a new take on an old theme: to show that Africa deserves a place on the cycling map.

Read the full article at How a Scrappy African Team is Making the Move From Gravel to Grand Tours on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
